result.description: upgraded software release with increased userfriendly capabilities in terms of installation manual examples the deliverable will contain specific sections to address the comments on D33 and D34 during the RP2 review additional content will relate to the installation and operating manual of the software and some examples on the IThERM demonstration cases as well as the solution of the case studies provided by the experts
